Name: Plague Rat
Description: Diseased vermin that attacks in swarms.

Name: Scavenger
Description: A desperate humanoid looking for scraps.

Name: Street Urchin
Description: A starving child with a sharpened shard.
Unique_Ability: Pickpocket: Steals 1 item on successful hit.

Name: Feral Dog
Unique_Ability: Crippling Bite: 20% chance to cause eff_frac_01.

Name: Corrupt Guard
Description: A militiaman who values gold over duty.

Name: Sentry Drone
Unique_Ability: Electric Shock: Drains 30 Stamina on hit.

Name: Militia Sniper
Description: Hiding in high ground with a heavy crossbow.
Unique_Ability: Longshot: Double damage if player is >10m away.

Name: Gutter Mutant
Description: A mass of muscle and chemical waste.

Name: Bloater
Description: A swelling mutant filled with corrosive gas.
Unique_Ability: Death Burst: Explodes on death applying eff_poison.

Name: Void Cultist
Description: A fanatic wielding whispers of the void.
Unique_Ability: Mind Sear: Deals 10 Sanity damage per hit.

Name: Fledgling
Description: A pale figure lurking in the shadows.
Unique_Ability: Life Drain: Heals for 50% of damage dealt.

Name: Enforcer Bot
Description: Heavy industrial bot repurposed for war.
Unique_Ability: Hydraulic Smash: High chance for eff_frac_01.

Name: Inquisitor
Unique_Ability: Neural Spike: Direct Sanity damage on hit.

Name: Void Walker
Description: A shimmering rift in the shape of a man.
Unique_Ability: Ethereal: 50% chance to dodge physical hits.

Name: The Screamer
Description: A floating horror with a distorted face.
Unique_Ability: Sonic Wail: Applies eff_fear to all nearby.

Name: The Ruler
Description: The undisputed tyrant of the town.

Name: Void Entity
Description: A cosmic horror from beyond the veil.
Unique_Ability: Abyssal Gaze: Reduces Max Sanity by 5/sec.
